name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Invite & Reply to Google Reviews

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered guide to boost Google reviews & engage customers with powerful auto responses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Reply Review

70% of businesses don't not reply to Google reviews. 
Yet 90% of your customer read them
You are not replying to one person but all your customers who read them  
AI Reply saves you time by crafting personal responses with a human touch
Full editorial control before sending 

AI Invite Reviews

50% of customers donâ€™t have a Google account. 
70% use different device or browser other than Google
Only 20% of invites will review you but will give up if difficult 
AI invites customers with a human voice guide that increases reviews
Automate invites through Zappier
